website_summaries.verdict: Adorable mat, but definitely not versatile for alternate uses. Relatively durable design, but most people seem to buy it for the message.
pros: UV coated to protect against fading and other sun damage
Soft and durable 100% virgin polypropylene material
Easy to clean and resistant to mold and mildew
Folds for easy storage into included carrying bag
cons: Technically reversible, but unreadable and looks silly when reversed
Black mat can get hot on the feet

customer_reviews.title: Not like the pics
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my frustration and disappointment to find that the pictures on the listing depicting the dark side as the way the words read correctly to be misleading. In fact, the white side has the words displayed correctly, and the dark side which would show less dirt has the words backwards. I would never have purchased this had I known that.
customer_reviews.author: MtRach

customer_reviews.title: FANTABULOUS RUG!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first to spend the money on a camping rug that would be outdoors 100% of the time but this worked great for us! We had our first camping trip of the year and this rug is HUGE! It came nicely rolled up to us and unrolled easy with no lumps or curls at the ends. fit our picnic table, 2 chairs and pretty much our whole outdoor set with room still for the kids to sit and play. Its reversable as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat for our new camper! We had a rainstorm one night and it got very muddy. We thought for sure it would be ruined but the first swept right off! Easy to maintain! We’ve gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this material
customer_reviews.text: This mat was okay but the material it is made from isn't very chair friendly. The first usage it started separating from where the chair legs are sitting. Now after a weekend of sitting on it you can see where all of the chairs were positioned. The material is crushed and or separated/damaged from the camping chairs. The chairs are also new so there is no damage on the chair legs that could cause the mat to get damaged. Don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this - The only thing I wasn't too ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this - The only thing I wasn't too happy with was if you flipped the rug to the black side the writing is backwards, but I am not sure this was a reversible rug to begin with. I love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a rug...
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Well made. Large size. Sharp graphics. Warning...this is quite large (even folded) and can be a little difficult to shake clean. I usually wait till we get home and vacuum it. If you like the graphics and the size it's not a bad price or quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay RaxterTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Its super cute. Its not for concrete
customer_reviews.text: Its super cute. Its not for concrete.... its better suited for grass and staking down as it is light and will blow everywhere if not secured down.
customer_reviews.author: Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Reversible?
customer_reviews.text: We went camping down in Maryland with the wild horses to break this mat in. Horses literally walked over it. It stood fine. Easy to sweep, easy to shake out with all the sand. The one downside is that I like the white side with black writing better, and it's unfortunate that when I flip to that side the writing is backwards, but it is what it is. It's definitely light weight and small so if you are concerned with weight and size constraints I'd definitely get this. We had a LOT of rando kids spill tons of food and drinks on this and it was absolutely easy and fine to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Two little Foos

customer_reviews.title: So Big!!
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted something large so that from either direction entering the RV, you would have ample area to clean your feet before entering. This is the biggest outdoor rug I have ever seen!. And the graphic with the little trailer and camp site is really cute, makes you smile every time you see it. I found one about this size for twice the money at the local RV shop - so this was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: It would be fine on grass or soft ground I suppose
customer_reviews.text: Not durable enough to place on gravely asphalt, which is what my RV site was. The material is a little cheap. But, as always, you get what you pay for, as this was very inexpensive. It would be fine on grass or soft ground I suppose. The décor/design looks real nice though. Will probably need to buy another more durable one to use on rougher surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Samssisters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is huge and I love it! Works great for glamping. I love the way it folds down small and the carrier bag. It's so convenient for camping and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Thin and weak. Not as durable as most... Updating after using for a few months. I full time RV and use this constantly. At first I thought a bit flimsy. This mat has stood up and paid dividends. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Mine started unraveling after the first use. It rained our whole trip so I only set it up on the last day and we were hardly outside. I opened it up when we got home and was rinsing it off with a water hose without a sprayer on it and one spot unraveled. I'm betting it quickly turns into a hole and doesn't stop coming apart. My first camping trip was after the return window so I'm out 80 bucks. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bambam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for camping!!!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor rug is the perfect addition to our new (to us) camper! The size of the rug and the design on it was a no brained. It fits great in front and looks sharp! We used it when we camped on sandy ground and it really helped with tracking inside. It held up through the stormy weather and was easy to shake off when we got home from our trip. The storage bag makes it great to store. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: goonie3211

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean and Pack Up!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome! It long enough to cover the space in front of our trailer with room for chairs and a table if we want. It’s super easy to clean and pack up. The carrying case is so convenient! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Blair

customer_reviews.title: Tore up after one use
customer_reviews.text: Awful, cheap product. Very unfortunate. Not durable enough for anything other than grass. Used for the first time at a KOA campground where gravel was the camper spot. Tore holes all in it and is now coming apart along one seam. The holes are from the rocks, but the coming apart appears to be from storage alone. Don’t buy unless you only camp in the grass!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea mccarty

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!! First trip it got a little wet/muddy- UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! First trip it got a little wet/muddy. When we packed up to go home there was mud stuck tp it. So a few days later I took it out to clean and all the mud, now dirt just fell out of it. Very good product. After 23 months. We went ti Hillsborough River State Park. Awesome SP BTW. Anyway out site was muddy, not squishy. Anyway this Matt worked FLAWLESSLY. We were there 8 nights and once we got back home we had very minimal amount of dirt in camper. IT KEPT THE MUD OUT!!! Awesome Matt
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug but no quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and price. But the durability is not there. We used it for 3 days sitting our fold up chairs on the rug and the feet messed up the rug. It fabric either tore or unraveled underneath where the chairs was sitting. It’s a shame because I think this product has some great potential. But I do not recommend this rug at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, durable, and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We LOOOOVE this outdoor rug! My husband and I took a long time before deciding and I’m glad we went with this! It’s easy to keep clean, it’s light weight, and we haven’t had any issues with it holding water or blowing up. It stays put and it’s a very nice quality. It looks perfect outside of our camper under our awning. We got lots of compliments on how cute the design is.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this purchase. I have been looking for a large affordable “rug” for camping for a long time. This is more of a plastic feeling material. It is light and thin so it is easy to put away and carry around and doesn’t take up much space for as large as it is. And the design is adorable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rug!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camper rug so far! The size is perfect for our 35 foot camper. Seems durable. We hand 3 dogs and a 1 year old that have been playing on our constantly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Shows the folding creases and seems like it can damage easy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how when the mat is laid flat, it shows the creases. I thought it would relax out of it after laying for a week, but it doesn't. I guess it helps when it is time to store it, thought, because it folds easily and neatly. Also, don't put your step with the legs down on it. The weight and friction will put a hole in the mat. It was easy to clean off with a leaf blower.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pic is wrong, writing on black side is backwards!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this based on the pic with the writing the right way on the black side but it is not. The white side has the writing the right way. Who wants a white mat when camping! Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: beckyc_1973

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my uncle when he retired. They bought a mobile home to travel the country and they love it! It's a really good find and sooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is white side with writing, not black.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking the black side would be the side with the saying readable, it's not, the white side is. I'm disappointed that it isn't in reverse like the photo shows. We haven't used it yet, when we do I will post pictures. It is light weight and has a good size carrying case. I will also post how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome. It came with a cut in it due packaging at Amazon. However Amazon made right on it. We repaired and have used it at our seasonal campsite for two years. Outside from April thru October. We do take up for winter. So it's wearing wonderfully. I truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat for your RV
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I was afraid to get this mat. Once I received it though, I was glad I purchased it. :) The wording is on the black side of the mat, it came with a storage bag. This is not as sturdy of a mat as the other one I had before, but this mat was also much cheaper. :) If you are looking for a mat for your RV, this is a good one to purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelli White

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The photos in this listing show the mat with the black side facing up. However, mine was the opposite and had the white side up. I didn’t notice it till it was already set up and used for an entire day camping. Had I known.. I wouldn’t have purchased this. Very misleading description for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean,and cute looking
customer_reviews.text: For the record, the writing is on the the dark side. Which is perfect for us because it's much easier to keep it looking clean. Great pricing for the size 9 feet x18 feet. Sturdiness, don't abuse the product and just sit or walk on it, it should last while.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not that good.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I first bought this. Loved the size and it would fold up easily into it's bag. The design is cute. But after one use I got two holes in it. One was made when we put up the portable awning and one of the feet caused a rip. The other which I thought shouldn't have happened occurred by the chairs we were sitting in. (Normal camping folding chairs) Oh and my dog got excited and was jumping and I guess her nail got caught and that caused a rip.
customer_reviews.author: RocVegas

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with description, the dark side has the lettering backwards. Anyone that camps would want this side up, very misleading in the "choice" of color. Also, there was no bag included. Took an extra day to ship, it's a Christmas gift, no time to return in 6 days. So dissatisfied with product and Amazon right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The material is so easy to clean. It’s easy to fold and store. I bought the biggest one and I love it. The black absorbs a lot of heat so I use the white side mostly. It doesn’t bother me that the words are backwards on the white side. It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Hannah Durand

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: fit the area I was covering, but was bigger than expected..it burns and tears easier than expected. Dropped a paper towel with hot bacon grease on it and it burned a hole. Disappointing..other than that it is holding up fairly well for being outside since May and looks better than the plywood decking that is there now.
customer_reviews.author: J from Mass

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver- Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This may is perfect for camping. Helps us relax outside, even barefoot.. great for setting up your chairs and picnic area and very easy to sweep. Facilitates going in and out of camper dirt on shoes feet into the camper. Wipes clean from spills!
customer_reviews.author: Andrés &  Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great size, awesome design, durable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the outside of our camper and love it! The design is so super cute and it’s nice and big, covering the whole outside area under our awning. It has a travel bag so you can put the rug back in when you are done using it which is great. I would definitely recommend this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Priced nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Priced nicely. Fits easily into the included storage pouch. It is light, so don't leave it without something heavy on it (or corner spikes) in any significant wind.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: This camping rug is so cute! It is soft on bare feet and helped to keep the majority of dirt from being tracked into the camper. There are loops at the corners for staking it down and it came with a handy, duffle-type storage bag. The 8’ x 11’ size covered the entire space under our awning.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D.

customer_reviews.title: Good travel RV Mat.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this. Great RV mat. Now, it is a vinyl weave so I understand it won’t hold up forever. I’m thinking I’ll get about 2 years out of it. My only complaint is water doesn’t drain through the weave. Just sits on top.
customer_reviews.author: Marly Schnuriger

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 8x18 foot rug. It can only be staked on the 4 corners. The 1st night we had it out the wind came up and ripped the straps from every corner. A rug this size needs a minimum of 8 anchor spots so it can withstand wind. We are going to try and salvage it by putting in grommets. I would not recommend this size rug.
customer_reviews.author: kitchen lady

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!! =)
customer_reviews.text: BUY ONE RIGHT NOW!!! WE LOVE THIS CAMPING MAT!!!!!!!! Light weight, easy to clean/sweep , folds up nice! We also get tons of compliments on it each weekend we camp!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn m.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: My better half picked this out to replace our old worn out RV mat. It comes with a nylon bag, not the sturdiest one I have seen but it works. Used the first time and got slight tear in it. I fully expect to get more, but that goes with the territory... Wife is happy, so I am too...(happy wife, happy life)..
customer_reviews.author: SILVERBUZZ

customer_reviews.title: This is A GREAT OUTDOOR RV CAMPER MAT
customer_reviews.text: I used this recently to camp at the lake. I've never had a mat or outdoor rug for my RV camping before. This made my time camping so much more enjoyable. I took my leaf blower. It's very easy to blow clean and fold up when done. Why did I wait so long to buy this?
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: outdoor camping rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so cool! Yes its reversible and words go opposite...but its huge, light weight...easy on bare feet...and it has a carrying case! I don't know how long it will last but for now its worth the $ I spent!
customer_reviews.author: Neena Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this rug - will be trying it this weekend when camping. Unfolded to see and was impressed with size for price and the sturdiness of the mat. I think it will serve us well. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: choc

customer_reviews.title: Brown
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! Easy to keep clean, we were on a sandy spot when using it for our first time. its is HUGE, we have a 28ft camper and it was the perfect length for the entire awning and some. We folded it up easy and stuck in a trashbag to clean when we got home. everything went well. Downfall- If you have smokers OR a close fire, easy to melt. I would totally purchase again and will if this one doesn't least forever.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the description:(
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I ordered this RV mat in January. Covid-19 happened and our camping adventures stopped. Flash forward to today, our first camping trip of the year, and this is what was in the box we unpacked a short while ago. It is not the happy camper mat I ordered. Disappointed but glad to be out of the house for a quiet social distancing camp out. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute mat for a camper/ RV
customer_reviews.text: This camper mat is perfect for our little camper! I love the quote.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Tam

customer_reviews.title: Camping Carpet
customer_reviews.text: We plan on using it when we can camp this year. It is a large carpet that seems to be very good quality and LARGE. I set it up in a windy day so make sure you have anchors on the corners to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon RL3

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun camping rug
customer_reviews.text: It works well, which that the right side was the white one. If you lay the rug with the white background up the design and words are backwards. So we just lay it with the black background up. No complains otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Vb2013

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Great outside mat for camper! Great price. very happy with the size. One thing is that it DOES NOT come with steaks to hold it down so we just went to walmart and got some for it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my parents as a camper warming gift and they love it! Mom says it helps keep some of the dirt and grime out of their camper they they and the dog would usually track in.
customer_reviews.author: Manowar83

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rug, does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug, perfect size for outside our 5th wheel. Not happy that it rips very easily. The first time we set our zero gravity chairs on it, it ripped where the feet of the chairs sat. We were very careful placing the chairs on it. I would not buy again for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: runnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: The description was large cosmetic flaws. But it arrived with a hole and a large section of weak seams. Cosmetic is appearance not structural. We did buy it at a reduced price. We would not have purchased it knowing it has holes and very weak seams. Those damages are not “cosmetic “
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: is not reversible cheap plastic material
customer_reviews.text: It was a very big mat but it's cheap made and I wanted to use the black side of the mat but I have to use white side up cause the words would be backwards I did not want a white mat that made me upset it stays dirty fast camping with a white mat an kids
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Thick and cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this today and very pleasantly surprised at how thick and cute this is in person!!! Less than $60 and I assumed it would be flimsy but I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Yes this rug is a must
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug got it for camping on the outside of the camper this is so easy to take a broom and clean it up very cute to it’s definitely a must have
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit 0 issues
customer_reviews.text: Easy cleanup and store. I have no idea why a few people said it was hard to get back in the bag?? I could fit two of these in the same bag! Folds up super easy and feel good under bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cascio

customer_reviews.title: Great rug, size, foldable for storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. Easy to fold up and store as we are limited on storage in out small camper. When it is unfolded, it is really nice and covers a large area. Better rug than we imagined for the nice price.
customer_reviews.author: JohnBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! Honestly at first I wasn’t sure. The pad my 5th wheel is sitting on is bigger coarse rock, the first time I put a chair on it there were marks left behind. I really thought it was going to have holes in no time.... The next morning I come out and the marks were gone! Months later still no holes!!!! This rug is great! My grandson plays on it, we entertain on it, and it takes quite a bit of traffic! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this. Hides dirt easily and easy to sweep off. Of course hard to fold back to original size. Very disappointed in the durability of it. We had two 6’ tables on it with only lunch and dinner items on it. Not very much weight at all and the feet punctured homes in the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: 8x18 blk/wht
customer_reviews.text: Well i ordered this product based on reviews of the 8x18 blk/wht mat. Everyone stated it is not as shown in pictures and that the correct wording is on the white side of the mat. So i purchased it based on that because i actually preferred the white side up and mine has the correct wording on the black side! Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great mat. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is just a mat but has held up great for us. We do find others with RVs with the same mat so if you want to be unique, don't buy it. If you like it and don't give a crap, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Salley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the camper.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the camper. Easy to clean after camping. Was a little worried about the white, but because it is plastic material it cleans up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice matt
customer_reviews.text: This matt is great for outside the landing of an RV looks great and the color being neitral fits with the majority of surrounding.
customer_reviews.author: Hans-Jurgen Greiner

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: Although it says it’s reversible, it is not. The words are backwards if reversed. I gave this 5 stars as it’s exactly what I was looking for❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cute outdoor camping carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, extra large camping carpet! Helps keep feet and shoes clean in front of our camper. Easiest to fold with two people but easily fits into provides storage bag. Some of the reverse side has popped through. Be careful of campfire ashes landing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca - Chalk Hill

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice mat but the reversible view on amazon is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: The mat is durable and meets my needs. The image on amazon shows the black side with white letters being the readable side and the white with black letters being the mirror image of this. The mat I received is the opposite. The White with black letters is the main view and the black with white letters is the mirror. I was looking to use the black with white letter side but it is all backwards. Oh well. Already had to use it so I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: MIGrizzly

customer_reviews.title: If you want the words the white side needs to be up
customer_reviews.text: This is cute camping rug. Nice size It sweeps off nicely and can be hosed down. We haven't folded it because we leave it out at our permanent camp site. We have noticed that its starting to get holes from where pie metal step sits on it. Over all it's a good rug for the price
customer_reviews.author: sillk

customer_reviews.title: Covers great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat to lay in front of our toy hauler which has the main door and the back garage door. This is long enough to cover both doors so you don't have to have multiple mats outside - Plus the carrying bag is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Third one i've bought
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what this says about my lifestyle when i have bought three of these mats, but i love them! they are huge, and easy to shake out and clean, and create a more homey environment for my tiny house on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Cute & useful
customer_reviews.text: Love our new camping mat. We put this down on the ground in front of our doors to help keep from tracking in dirt and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Just another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Spans both doors on 35' camper
customer_reviews.text: Love the rug and carry case to roll it up and store. Spans both doors which I love! Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily. Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Tears easily. Not very durable, but it is a cool mat and will last a season or two as long as you take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Weave felt a little lose so we'll have to watch what type of chairs that we use so they don't poke threw but other than that it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris I.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camper. Haven't used it yet. But it looks like it'll be perfect and clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rug!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this rug!! We get so many compliments on it and it is huge! I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Nikki and Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not good for placement on stones. Wears fast.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, great size, not good for seasonal campers. Would be great for weekend adventures or placement on a deck or grassy area. Would be great for rent camping!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Have used once, and then COVID-19 made us stay home!
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be anchored so the wind does not lift it up when it is breezy! I like the material as it can be hosed clean if a drink or something is spilled on it!
customer_reviews.author: Olde Sojer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our rug for years and we love it. Make sure it dries completely or it will stink! We scrub ours with soap and water and let it dry completely before storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blades

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love how big this thing is. Great price and cute design. It does snag easy so that’s why I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used it all summer. Had to fold it up during a heavy wind by myself, not a problem. love the style, and water or rain flows right through it. It and the bag are a little light and flimsy keep it staked down. Overall happy
customer_reviews.author: The person who bought stuff

customer_reviews.title: Tears EASY, don’t waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for our camper. And just after a few days of use, it has started to tear. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A richards

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when I got it. Stayed dry after rain. Found a few holes after a two week use. Don’t see this weathering the years.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rich-Szigat

customer_reviews.title: Not very thick
customer_reviews.text: No really made out of the material we wanted....thin! But very large.....! We love that part!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: We love it Easy to sweep but lawn chairs can make holes in it or snags But it’s cute to me 😢
customer_reviews.author: Cary Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is what my father wanted as his christmas gift for his new motorhome. It is just as described, great quality. Looking forward to seeing this in use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, fun looking mat.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the look! It is really light weight so it will be interesting to see how durable it will be. I personally like the weight as it makes for easy storage with the included bag. Would be nice if if it had additional tie down points.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey B

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping. It rained a lot but this was great for keeping muddy paws out of my trailer. Easy to clean. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: Had a 6 foot folding camp table sitting on rug for 4 days, moved table to tear down camp and found large hole under 1 leg, not to happy for a 1st time use.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Cozik

customer_reviews.title: Nice camping mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat and big enough to go in front of both doors Writing is backwards on light tan side which pictures show if you look close.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Backwards
customer_reviews.text: Nice rug, but it was not as pictured. I was expecting black to be the front side however the white was the front side. The text is backwards on the black side. Misleading, but still a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to our personality and fits the patio of our 28ft RV perfect. Sheds sand and water awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Missing back but mother inlaw loves it
customer_reviews.text: My mother inlaw loves it but it should have came with a storage bag does anyone know who I can contact to get it? I would give it a 5 star but missing bag
customer_reviews.author: RME_CA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see it, it was a Christmas gift but my son and daughter in law loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for our rv
customer_reviews.text: The rug is huge but be warned it's very light weight. We liked that as it made it dry quickly when it rained but you need to anchor not just corners but sides
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat. Didn’t give it 5 stars for durability because I sat on it with a camping chair and it put a small hole in it. Huge size though.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Raynolds

customer_reviews.title: So cute but not made durable at all
customer_reviews.text: This was so disappointing as the side tabs broke after the first use. It came with a giant wear mark on it too. For the price it isnt of good quality at all I am so bummed. It has such a cute design. I would return but we don't have a huge box to put it in!?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but some things to consider....
customer_reviews.text: We got our rug yesterday. Fits perfect and love the design. One thing to think about, if you have dogs their nails will pull the rug. The way our campsite is set up our dog has to be on the mat because there's no other space for her. Not a huge deal but for the money I probably would have went with different material.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great when camping if you have gravel or dirt when coming out of your camper
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for our T@G teardrop camper
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly under our ARB 8x10 awning. Best when campsites lack grass, avoids dragging mud into our teardrop camper. Our big dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Frank

product_meta.title: Stylish Camping RH8187 Brown/Beige 8 Feet x18 Feet RV Home Mat
product_meta.description: Color:Brown/Beige| Size:8 Feet x 18 FeetThis reversible outdoor mat is designed for home patio or garden, creating your RV outdoor space, afternoons in the park or days at the beach. Sweep clean with a broom or spray clean with water. Woven polypropylene dries quickly to prevent mold and mildew. Coated with UV protection to resist sun damage and fading. Corner loops can be staked to hold it in place. Folds easily for storage in included carrying bag. Note: Viewing colors on the internet can be difficult. Different monitor and screen settings may not represent exact color hues. We do our best to represent the colors as accurately as possible.
feature_bullets: Soft and durable 100% virgin polypropylene material
Easy to clean--just sweep away dirt or spray with water
Breathable and safe for grass; UV protection against sun damage
Light weight and can be folded into compact size for easy storage (carrying bag included)
